coreAttributes.name: maid taur-skirt
coreAttributes.description: A specially-designed skirt to cover the lower part of a maid, suitable to be fit onto the lower body of any taur race.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the maid taur-skirt down over [npc.her] head, before allowing it to settle into place over [npc.her] [npc.legRace]'s body.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the maid taur-skirt down over [npc2.namePos] head, before allowing it to settle into place over [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] the maid taur-skirt down over [npc2.namePos] head, before firmly pulling it down over [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] maid taur-skirt, before pulling it up and over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc2.namePos] maid taur-skirt, before pulling it up and over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] maid taur-skirt, before yanking it up and over [npc2.her] head.
